content:
/>
II.i.1.A.3.b
.
Confirming Successful Submission
After submitting documents to the scanning vendor, senders must
verify in
Direct Upload
that all steps of submission have been successful, and
review the claims folder to ensure the submission was completely uploaded to the claims folder.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A - Centralized Mail (CM) Intake
citation: Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A
